DOC.brief_summary: Cross-sectional cohort study participant HIV without protocol-defined Fanconi syndrome ( confirm creatinine clearance [ CLcr ] decline evidence proximal tubulopathy ) .
DOC.brief_title: Fanconi Syndrome Due ARVs HIV-Infected Persons
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Fanconi Cases Subjects must meet follow inclusion criterion eligible participation study . Adult ( great equal 18 year ) HIV1 infected subject regardless race ethnicity . Subjects must stable ARV regimen great equal 1 month prior study entry . Evidence protocoldefined Fanconi syndrome TDF subject must TDFcontaining regimen time onset Fanconi syndrome . Negative serum pregnancy test ( female childbearing potential ) . Less two year postmenopausal woman childbearing potential ( TDF subject ) agree follow adequate birth control barrier method agree abstain heterosexual intercourse participate study . The ability understand sign write informed consent form , must obtain prior initiation study procedure . Exclusion Criteria Fanconi Cases Subjects meet follow exclusion criterion enrol study . Non TDF subject receive TDF within prior 6 month , receive great 2 week cumulative treatment . TDF subject previously serve TDF control protocol . History current alcohol substance abuse judge investigator potentially interfere laboratory result . Inclusion Criteria Controls Subjects must meet follow inclusion criterion eligible participation study . Adult ( great equal 18 year ) HIV1 infected subject regardless race ethnicity . No evidence protocoldefined Fanconi syndrome On TDFcontaining regimen match Fanconi case clinic location , duration TDF age . Negative serum pregnancy test ( female childbearing potential ) . The ability understand sign write informed consent form , must obtain prior initiation study procedure . Exclusion Criteria Controls Subjects meet follow exclusion criterion enrol study . â€¢ History current alcohol substance abuse judge investigator potentially interfere laboratory result .
